summary:
Member of Design-Change [dizain-peremeni] from Yandex.

Participant in the exhibition called "Interpretation. Man and Public Space". It is a joint project of the Hermitage Youth Center and the Parsons School of Design (New York).

Portfolio with old cases: https://www.behance.net/taevnab30e

Projects for SberBank are under NDA (Non-disclosure agreement) - a non-disclosure agreement of confidential information.
Therefore, I cannot show examples in the public domain.
However, I will be happy to tell you about the projects at the interview.

school.name: British Higher School of Art and Design

profile_positions.title: Senior UX Designer
Lead Product Designer / UX/UI

company.name: Educational Center "Coalition", online and offline education

profile_positions.company: Educational Center "Coalition", online and offline education
profile_positions.description:
I created new projects for the commercial direction of the organization and optimized the existing ones.
I developed internal tools for the company. (Web applications)
I developed multi-page web sites and landing pages for various projects of the organization.
I conducted UX-studies: depth interviews, empathy maps, CJM, usability testing.

Achievements:
- a personal account was created for users of the educational portal;
- a public and administrative part of the portal for Olympiads was created under my lead;
- I designed webinar and a video player;
- CRM system.

Additional sources on the website: https://school-olymp.ru/ and https://апо.рф
Portfolio: https://www.behance.net/taevnab30e
profile_positions.title: UX/UI Designer

profile_positions.description:
I created and was engaged in supporting the main product of the company - the news portal about cryptocurrencies and blockchain.
I developed multi-page websites and landing pages.
I designed presentations and media kits.

Achievements the following was created:
- http://bitcryptonews.ru/ portal;
- the public and administrative parts of the franchise aggregator;
- information and commercial landings.

Portfolio: https://www.behance.net/taevnab30e
profile_positions.title: Web Designer
